Package antlr.actions.cpp

Interface Summary
ActionLexerTokenTypes  
 

Class Summary
ActionLexer Perform the following translations: AST related translations ## -> currentRule_AST #(x,y,z) -> codeGenerator.getASTCreateString(vector-of(x,y,z)) #[x] -> codeGenerator.getASTCreateString(x) #x -> codeGenerator.mapTreeId(x) Inside context of #(...), you can ref (x,y,z), [x], and x as shortcuts.
